dcterms:creator: K. J. Hayworth
J. L. Morgan
R. Schalek
D. R. Berger
D. G. C. Hildebrand
J. W. Lichtman
dcterms:description: The original volumetric dataset comprises the anterior portion of an adult female Drosophila melanogaster brain cut in the frontal plane. Each section was acquired at 4 × 4 × 40 nm3vx−1, amounting to 4 million camera images and 50 TB of raw data.
dcterms:title: Drosophila TEM data

dcterms:creator: I. Arganda-Carreras
C. O. Sorzano
R. Marabini
J. M. Carazo
C. Ortiz-de Solorzano
J. Kybic
dcterms:description: A small sub-volume of registered and labeled TEM data from the CREMI challenge used as ground-truth for assessing registration quality.
dcterms:title: Labeled Drosophila TEM data from CREMI challenge

dcterms:creator: J. L. Morgan
D. R. Berger
A. W. Wetzel
J. W. Lichtman
dcterms:description: A small volume selected from a mouse lateral geniculate nucleus dataset acquired using SEM with a resolution of 4 × 4 × 30 nm3vx−1, containing folds caused by cracks in the substrate.
dcterms:title: Mouse lateral geniculate nucleus SEM data with fold artifacts
